0;background:#ccc;color:#000;padding:.2em 0}*{font-family:Roboto,sans-serif}.container{max-width:800px;margin:0 auto}body{padding-top:50px;background:linear-gradient(90deg,#006d77,#83c5be,#edf6f9)}.uploader{border-radius:20px;background:hsla(0,0%,100%,.4);backdrop-filter:blur(8px);box-shadow:1px 5px 18px 2px 50px}.uploader-title{font-size:38px;margin-bottom:35px}.uploader-imgs{display:flex;width:100%;justify-content:flex-start;align-items:flex-start;margin-bottom:35px;flex-wrap:wrap}.uploader-imgs__item{width:100%;height:auto;background-color:#edf6f9}.uploader-imgs__item-link{text-decoration:none;color:inherit;border:0;outline:none;user-select:none}.uploader-imgs__item-info{opacity:0;top:-30px;justify-content:space-between;padding:5px .cursor{cursor:pointer}.uploader-imgs .removing{opacity:0;transition:opacity .5s}.uploader-imgs .selected{animation:trambling-animation .8s ease-in-out 0s infinite normal none
